BatteryStats.cc

00014 /*
00015  * Battery Stats collects and formats times series and summary data
00016  * from the Battery.
00017  *
00018  * BatteryStats' summary() and detail() methods are called by
00019  * Battery's finish() to format its table of device battery
00020  * consumption. (Methods shoud manage their own resources, since own
00021  * finish() may be done).
00022  *
00023  * For time series data it subscribes to BatteryState published by the
00024  * Battery.  Note: only BatteryStats should do this, all other modules
00025  * should use the Battery's estimateResidual() method (Battery Stats
00026  * does this as well, but for now estimate just follows redisual
00027  * capacity.)
00028  */
00029 #include "BatteryStats.h"
00030 
00031 #include <iostream>
00032 
00033 #include "BatteryState.h"
00034 #include "DeviceEntry.h"
00035 
00036 Define_Module(BatteryStats);
00037 
00038 const simsignalwrap_t BatteryStats::catBatteryStateSignal = simsignalwrap_t(MIXIM_SIGNAL_BATTERY_CHANGE_NAME);
00039 
00040 void BatteryStats::initialize(int stage)
00041 {
00042   BaseModule::initialize(stage);
00043   if (stage==0) {
00044     doDetail = 0;
00045     doDetail = par("detail").boolValue();
00046     debugEV << "show details = " << doDetail << endl;
00047 
00048     doTimeSeries = 0;
00049     doTimeSeries = par("timeSeries").boolValue();
00050     debugEV << "show timeSeries = " << doTimeSeries << endl;
00051 
00052     if (doTimeSeries) {
00053       findHost()->subscribe(catBatteryStateSignal, this);
00054 
00055       // suggest enabling only residualVec (omnetpp.ini), unless
00056       // others are of interest
00057 
00058       residualVec.setName("capacity");
00059       residualVec.setUnit("mW-s");
00060       relativeVec.setName("capacity(relative)");
00061 
00062       estimateVec.setName("estimate");
00063       estimateVec.setUnit("mW-s");
00064       estimateRelVec.setName("estimate(relative)");
00065     }
00066   }
00067 }
00068 
00069 void BatteryStats::handleMessage(cMessage */*msg*/)
00070 {
00071   error("BatteryStats doesn't handle any messages");
00072 }
00073 
00074 // summary() and detail() are invoked by Battery's finish() method
00075 
00076 void BatteryStats::summary(double init, double final, simtime_t_cref lifetime)
00077 {
00078   Enter_Method_Silent();
00079   recordScalar("nominal", init, "mW-s");
00080   recordScalar("total", init - final, "mW-s");
00081   recordScalar("lifetime", lifetime, "s");
00082   recordScalar("Mean power consumption", (init - final)/SIMTIME_DBL(simTime()), "mW");
00083 }
00084 
00085 void BatteryStats::detail(const DeviceEntry *devices, int numDevices)
00086 {
00087   Enter_Method_Silent();
00088   if (!doDetail)
00089     return;
00090 
00091   recordScalar("num devices", numDevices);
00092 
00093   for (int i = 0; i < numDevices; ++i){
00094     double total = 0;
00095     for (int j = 0; j < devices[i].numAccts; ++j) {
00096       total += devices[i].accts[j];
00097     }
00098     recordScalar(devices[i].name.c_str(), i);
00099     recordScalar("device total (mWs)", total);
00100     for (int j = 0; j < devices[i].numAccts; ++j) {
00101       recordScalar("account", j);
00102       recordScalar("energy (mWs)", devices[i].accts[j]);
00103       recordScalar("time (s)", devices[i].times[j]);
00104     }
00105   }
00106 }
00107 
00108 void BatteryStats::receiveSignal(cComponent *source, simsignal_t signalID, cObject *obj)
00109 {
00110     Enter_Method_Silent();
00111     BaseModule::receiveSignal(source, signalID, obj);
00112 
00113     if (signalID == catBatteryStateSignal) {
00114     double residualCapacity;
00115     double relativeCapacity;
00116 
00117     // battery time series never publishes capacity < 0, just 0
00118     const BatteryState* pBatState = dynamic_cast<const BatteryState*>(obj);
00119     if (!pBatState)
00120       return;
00121     residualCapacity = pBatState->getAbs();
00122     residualVec.record(residualCapacity);
00123     relativeCapacity = pBatState->getRel();
00124     relativeVec.record(relativeCapacity);
00125 
00126     BaseBattery *const battery = dynamic_cast<BaseBattery*>(source);
00127     if (battery) {
00128       // for comparison, also get the estimated residual capacity
00129       double estimate = battery->estimateResidualAbs();
00130       estimateVec.record(estimate);
00131 
00132       double estimateRel = battery->estimateResidualRelative();
00133       estimateRelVec.record(estimateRel);
00134     }
00135     }
00136 }
00137 
00138 void BatteryStats::finish() {
00139 }
